origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinanceNews.get_articles', 'description': 'Get articles about a specific topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic to search for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing articles about the topic.'}]}, {'name': 'MarketData.get_growth', 'description': 'Get growth data for a specific market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'market', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The market to get growth data for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The quarter to get data for.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'growth', 'description': 'A dictionary containing growth data for the market.'}]}, {'name': 'MarketSurvey.get_acceptance', 'description': 'Get acceptance data for a specific product.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'product', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The product to get acceptance data for.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'acceptance', 'description': 'A dictionary containing acceptance data for the product.'}]}, {'name': 'ProductDetail.get_product_info', 'description': 'Get detailed information about a product.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'product_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the product.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'info', 'description': 'A dictionary containing detailed information about the product.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
